data.name: Computer Graphics
data.description: Define 3D objects using triangles, 2D and 3D transformations, coordinate system transformations, rendering, parallel and perspective projection, clipping of projected objects outside the viewport, hidden surfaces, local lighting models, various shading methods, texture mapping, simple graphics programming.

data.name: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
data.description: Basic concepts about the history of AI and its importance, optimization techniques for applications of AI, feature extraction, probabilistic reasoning, rule-based systems, reinforcement learning, supervised and unsupervised learning, Bayesian and regression models.
